solution_line_template: There are {initial_potatoes_kg} kg - {damaged_potatoes_kg} kg = <<{initial_potatoes_kg}-{damaged_potatoes_kg}={sellable_potatoes_kg}>>{sellable_potatoes_kg} kg of sellable potatoes.
These will fit into {sellable_potatoes_kg} kg / {bag_capacity_kg} kg/bag = <<{sellable_potatoes_kg}/{bag_capacity_kg}={num_bags}>>{num_bags} bags
In total, these will be sold for {num_bags} bags * ${price_per_bag}/bag = $<<{num_bags}*{price_per_bag}={total_sale_amount}>>{total_sale_amount}
